https://tmrev.io/movie/40924-Doña Herlinda and Her Son 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dLUbN471tXo7rrdVIFRxEXSUPCw.jpg A manipulative mama deftly manages the life of her homosexual son so that he can have his cake and eat it too. A woman of means, she does this by allowing her son, a doctor, to tryst in her home with his lover. Putting her son's happiness above all else, she then arranges a marriage of convenience to a woman. Doña Herlinda and Her Son
